description._content: [Mary, Queen of Scots] [between ca. 1890 and ca. 1900]. 1 photomechanical print : photochrom, color. Notes: Title from the Detroit Publishing Co., catalogue J--foreign section. Detroit, Mich. : Detroit Photographic Company, 1905. Print no. "13180". Forms part of: Views of landscape and architecture in Scotland in the Photochrom print collection. Subjects: Mary,--Queen of Scots,--1542-1587. Format: Photochrom prints--Color--1890-1900. Rights Info: No known restrictions on reproduction. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Views of landscape and architecture in Scotland (DLC) 2001703567 More information about the Photochrom Print Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.pgz Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsc.07692 hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3g10768 Call Number: LOT 13407, no. 181 [item]

note._content: Idealized view of the Palace of Holyroodhouse (where Mary lived), Salisbury Crags and Arthur's Seat, Edinburgh. www.flickr.com/photos/browniebear/3352577422/ - a 1904 postcard
note.author: 99646216@N00
